content:
Craft an item of type: spruce_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 18, "index": 36}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 63, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft spruce_fence_gate, I need to make spruce_planks which are made from spruce_log. Therefore, I will move the spruce_log at slot 25 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: spruce_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 18, "index": 36}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 63, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted spruce_planks, I need to move them into my inventory. There is space at slot 11, so I will move them there.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: spruce_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 18, "index": 36}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 63, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 45}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft a spruce_fence_gate. Spruce_fence_gates require placing two sticks on the top and bottom rows and spruce planks in between them. Therefore I will first need to move the stick from slot 38 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: spruce_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 18, "index": 36}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 63, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the stick has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the spruce plank to the middle of the crafting grid. Slot 2 is in the middle of the crafting grid, and therefore I will move the spruce plank to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: spruce_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 18, "index": 36}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 63, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the spruce plank has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another stick to the bottom row of the crafting grid. Slot 3 is on the bottom row of the crafting grid, and therefore I will move the stick to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: spruce_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 18, "index": 36}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 38}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 63, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the stick has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another stick to the left side of the crafting grid. Slot 4 is on the left side of the crafting grid, and therefore I will move the stick to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "spruce_fence_gate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "music_disc_11", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "rabbit_foot", "quantity": 18, "index": 36}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 63, "index": 44}, {"type": "dead_tube_coral_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 45}]

Ok
